ABOUT US
/$
$
Get Hooked: Fresh Seafood, Right from the Boat to Your Plate
/$
$
Get ready to embark on a culinary adventure at Get Hooked Bar & Grill, now open in the heart of Downtown New Port Richey on Main Street.
​
As a local favorite, Get Hooked is renowned for its commitment to serving the freshest seafood in the area. With our own fishing fleet and strong partnerships with local commercial fishing captains, we ensure that every dish is crafted with the finest, locally-sourced ingredients.
​
From succulent shrimp to delectable grouper, Get Hooked offers a diverse menu that caters to all seafood lovers. Whether you're craving a classic fish and chips or a gourmet seafood platter, our talented chefs will tantalize your taste buds with every bite.
​
So, the next time you're in Downtown New Port Richey, be sure to stop by Get Hooked Bar & Grill. Indulge in the freshest seafood, enjoy the lively atmosphere, and experience the true essence of coastal cuisine.
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
REVIEWS
/$
$
What can we say? We’re obsessed with Seafood!
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Went to the new location in New Port Richey. The food was amazing!! Presentation was outstanding. John, the owner, took time to talk with us and showed his appreciation for us coming tonight. I will definitely go again. Prices were excellent. Steak was cooked perfectly. They had stone crab as a special. Again amazing taste and price. Our server was great. As a new restaurant in NPR, they will do wonderful. Go check it out!! You won’t be disappointed
/$
$
Melissa
/$
/$
$
$
Amazing food and service. Our server Angel was on point today. Very friendly, joked with us, quick on refills, very knowledgeable and just overall great guy. This was our first time ever going to Get Hooked and we will definitely be back another time.
/$
$
Ashley
/$
/$
$
$
Get Hooked is a casual, fun place to eat delicious seafood. Great food every time! They have great lobster bisque and steamed mussels. We all got lobster rolls which were filling and yummy. Prices are fair. They had drink specials which the big drinks were really tasty. I highly recommend this cool restaurant.
/$
$
Pat
